description: Creates a new email archive resource for storing and retaining emails.

parameters.name: ArchiveName
parameters.description: A unique name for the new archive.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A unique token Amazon SES uses to recognize retries of this request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: Retention
parameters.description: The period for retaining emails in the archive before automatic deletion. RetentionPeriod (string) --- The enum value sets the period for retaining emails in an archive.

nested_params.name: RetentionPeriod
nested_params.description: The enum value sets the period for retaining emails in an archive.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags used to organize, track, or control access for the resource. For example, { 'tags': {'key1':'value1', 'key2':'value2'} }. (dict) --- A key-value pair (the value is optional), that you can define and assign to Amazon Web Services resources. The key of the key-value tag. The value of the key-value tag.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key of the key-value tag.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value of the key-value tag.

nested_items.name: ArchiveId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the newly created archive.
